title: What Is Corki's Role (AD)?

replies.body:
Poke into an all it bring ignite for this strategy.
Use corki when you have and Ad mid laner, as his damage is mixed or if you have a heavy poke comp corki would work, but so would {{champion:81}} .
Also bring corki when you have {{champion:432}}  support. Duo Roams op.
If your playing mid lane, use corki when you have an apc ({{champion:268}} {{champion:69}}  or an Ap{{champion:4}} Bot lane)

Personally I like him as he possesses the capability to single handedly poke down enemy ADC low enough to be all in. He's good in a lane with someone who can sustain him since he IMO is one of the only ADC's left who can bring decent poke with TLD as their keystone unlike every other ADC.

Hes a Caster Carry, similar to Quinn who uses spells to harass. Its just because of his Ability that hes a good champion pick because its hard to build versus a magic damage burst champ that builds AD/Crit
